meanings.definition: A genus of rodents, including mice and rats.
meanings.sent1: The mus scurried across the field.
meanings.sent2: I saw a mus in the barn last night.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat chased the mus around the house.
meanings.sent4: The mus population in the city seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent5: The tiny mus left tiny footprints in the snow.
